fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
European Working Time Directive 
Directive on Cross-Border Healthcare 
Directive on Recognition of Professional Qualifications 
TTIP
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: FEMS goal is to defend at European level the moral and material interests of doctors working under administrative subordination, to ensure these doctors and their patients the best possible level of working conditions, decent salaries, continuous professional development, diagnostic and therapeutic independence with respect to administrations, whose exclusively economic point of view can sometimes be in conflict with the principles of a quality health system and correct medicine
